product_name: Seattle Sports Reign Backpack Dry Bag
long_description: Perfect for portages, launches in rainy weather and general use, the waterproof Seattle Sports Reign Backpack Dry Bag helps keep your gear out of splashes and moisture. The Seattle Sports Reign Backpack Dry Bag is made of tough, waterproof, polyurethane-coated nylon. Outer pocket with coated zipper and zipper garage for quick and secure access to smaller items. Radio-frequency welded seams offer high durability, and the backpack features a PVC-free construction. Roll-top closure offers secure waterproofing. Exterior lash points; reflective logo; dual compression straps.
short_description: Perfect for portages, launches in rainy weather and general use, the waterproof Seattle Sports Reign Backpack Dry Bag helps keep your gear out of splashes and moisture.
